refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
scoutapm_list_instrumented_functions returns an array containing a list of all functions that the scoutapm extension is able to instrument in the current installation.

&reftitle.examples; Fetch the list of functions scoutapm will instrument
<?php print_r(scoutapm_list_instrumented_functions()); ?>
&example.outputs.similar;
Array ( [0] => file_get_contents [1] => file_put_contents [2] => fopen [3] => fread [4] => fwrite [5] => pdo->exec [6] => pdo->query [7] => pdo->prepare [8] => pdostatement->execute )
